blog.name: ao3feed-yoonseok
blog.title: Hwagae Market
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jung Hoseok|J-Hope/Min Yoongi|Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Blue Side
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yFPVj9

by miiiyo

❝L'absence du plus âgé le hantait constamment. Même dans ses rêves qui se coloraient de bleu, à l'image de la mer. Il se plaisait à imaginer un Yoongi vivant, qu'il pourrait toucher autant qu'il le voudrait. Un Yoongi qu'il pourrait serrer contre lui et sentir son odeur iodée l'envahir. Ses yeux reflétant l'océan le sonderaient jusqu'au plus profond de lui, atteignant le petit soleil qu'il cachait depuis tant d'années.❞

Inspiré de ‘Blue Side’ de j-hope !

Words: 796, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Français

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Jung Hoseok | J-Hope
  • Relationships: Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Min Yoongi | Suga
  • Additional Tags: Sad, I’m Sorry, How Do I Tag, Blue side, Missing Persons, Suicidal Thoughts, References to Depression, rip yoongi, Best Friends, Childhood Friends


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yFPVj9

summary: Go To Hell, For Heaven’s Sake
title: Go To Hell, For Heaven’s Sake
body:
AU – Angel & Demon

Name - Min Yoongi / SUGA

Open/Closed – Closed

Closed To – @taetaeloli

Location – Seoul, South Korea

Time – 10:45 p.m.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

x Info Time x

Angels came first in the world then humans, which God created, and it wasn’t long before demons were born from tainted and sinful angels and corrupted human souls. Every few years an angel is born in heaven and they’re taught for at least twenty years on things they are suppose to know: history, rules, skills, powers, etc. Every angel has a human counterpart that they are suppose to watch over and protect also known as a guardian angel. The angel’s job is to watch over their human. They are not allowed to reveal themselves to their human and especially not to fall in love with them. Falling in love with a human was forbidden due to the different species and how a human could corrupt and cause an angel do things that they were against heaven’s rules.

An angel that has been tainted, their pure white feathered wings would start turning black. Depending on how long the angel has been tainted, they may or may not be able to be purified. If there are more black feathers than white then all the angel can do is slow down his or her corruption. If there is more white then it is possible to purify the angel. Fully tainted angels are kicked from heaven and down to hell where they begin the painful process of having their body’s reconstructed and changed to fit hell’s nature causing them to become a demon.

Demons can be recognized by their slightly pointed ears, fangs, and their eyes would occasionally flash red, gold or blue depending on age. Young demons are red, middle aged are gold, while elders had piercing blue eyes. It’s rare to find an elder due to the fact they prefer not leaving their homes in hell. Age doesn’t mean another demon is stronger meaning a young demon could be stronger than a middle age or elder demon and still have red eyes. Their eyes flash their ages’ color when the are experiencing strong emotions. Most demons tend to stay in their half demon form, which usually consists of leathery demonic wings, a long pointed tail, and slightly elongated nails. Demons can shift into a human form and walk on earth if they wish as a ‘human’ but they would be easily be discovered by an angel or very spiritual person due to their demonic aura. Their strong sense of smell and hearing occasionally is a weakness against strong scents and loud noises.

Angels are much harder to distinguish without their white wings and unnatural and pure look to them while in their angel form. Those their most distinguishable feature would be their eyes, which are usually warm, loving, and filled with life. Some male angels tend to have feminine features like legs, waist, face, etc. Despite that demons, on the other hand, can notice an angel by just their scent which either has a fruity or flowery scent mixed with something else that usually irritates most demons. One reason why demons dislike angels is usually an angel’s scent is overbearing depending on how strong the angel is. Another reason is that both species were polar opposites of each other, naturewise.

Despite their differences, very rarely an angel and demon would be friends or even more than that. Rarely because demons can get a power boost if they manage to kill and absorb the power of an angel through their blood. (Though it is possible to gain power through an angel by drinking their blood, they chose to kill said angel since angels would rather fight to the death than be used as a power source). When it comes down to an angel and a demon in a relationship, demons care a little bit but in the end, angels care more about it. To them the worse kind of relationship an angel could be in with a demon is a homosexual one since it went against their law. Even homosexual angels keep quiet about their own relationships since the fact they’re with the same sex, they are slowly but surely tainting themselves meaning they have to regularly cleanse themselves to keep their wings white.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The first time the old dark haired demon laid eyes on the little blond angel was more than fifty years ago. It was more along the lines of an accident in all honesty. He didn’t plan on coming in contact with an angel let along a newly created fledgling fresh out of God’s making. He was just roaming down the streets of the red light district in the human world looking for something to entertain him. It didn’t matter to him what entertained him. Sex with men or women, gambling, drinking, murder. It was all the same to him. If it did then he would have to find new ways of keeping himself busy when he didn’t have to devour a human soul or complete some pathetic  contract with trash.

That’s all humans were to him. Food or trash. Those he made contracts with were both. Exasperation and annoyance towards the one who summoned him to do some heinous crime for them yet possessing some twisted form of amusement. Exasperation and annoyance towards the reason why he was summoned and amusement knowing that their expression will be entertaining to see while he turns on them and kills them when he is done. That’s what he got done doing when he came across the little angel. He finished a job. Killed some retarded bastard human who ‘ordered’ him to kill the woman who cheated on him with another man. Silly human. He didn’t think it through when he chose to summon a demon of his caliber. No human did. Honestly. Fools. All of them really…but at least he had fun making the man scream in pain. Though his fun ran out when the human died and his soul was devoured. No matter. He always managed to find his entertainment.

And entertainment he found…albeit surrounded by human filth that was attempting to drag his newly found entertainment off somewhere. It was probably to a whore house. He didn’t know that the entertainment was a fledgling due to the it’s small, weak and pure presence. The old demon would have honestly ignored the fledgling until he caught it’s scent. It was an exotic combination. Vanilla…with a hint of lavender and purity he guessed. It wasn’t very strong, but his well trained and sensitive nose could pick up among the filth around them. His dark eyes went straight to where the fledgling was before moving over in that direction. It was a casual action. Casual enough for him to be ignored by the trash and for his hand to spear right through the male trash’s back. His pale hand gripped the human’s heart and ripped it out with little to no hesitation. The now deceased human’s partners attempted to leave, but with a spear composed of darkness through their chest was enough to leave the trash where they were.

The demon inhaled slowly and deeply through his nose while his eyes slid shut. The coppery smell of blood… It was such a beautiful scent. The additional scent of angel was even better. It made him wonder what the fledgling’s blood would smell like. His eyes opened to reveal piercing, icy blue orbs that focused intently on the terrified baby angel. He calmly removed his arm from the human’s chest allowing the body to hit the ground before taking a couple of steps towards the newborn angel until he was directly in front of the small thing.

The dark haired demon squatted down in front of the young angel and stared with his unnatural blue cat shaped eyes. He took in the other’s appearance with an impassive expression. The fledgling had fluffy and soft looking hair, which was a pale blond color. It probably was as soft as it looked if he knew better. He was small; childlike and delicate like if the demon decided to hit the child across the face using barely an eighth of his power, he could damage him beyond repair. The angel’s skin was smooth, pale and unmarred except for that crimson that splattered on the poor thing’s face. It was a rather beautiful sight in his opinion- seeing him covered in blood even if it was only slightly. What was an even more beautiful sight was the fledgling’s eyes. They were such a breathtaking shade of lavender, but filled with fear and horror. It’s how he usually liked seeing it especially in pain in the ass angels, but this fledgling rubbed him the wrong way.

The demon exhaled slowly before blinking once allowing his eyes to fade back to a dark brown almost black color. No need to terrify this newborn for now. ”Oi… Little angel. What are you doing so far away from home? Babies like you shouldn’t be down here. It’s not safe. You could get hurt…or worse killed.” To calm the angel down, he reached out with his clean hand and placed it on the soft and fluffy hair (Ah ha! He was right! It was soft!) before gently stroking his hair in a reassuring manner. God dammit… If any demon sees him act like this towards the fledgling then he’s killing them violently. ”I’m Yoongi. What’s your name, fledgling? Do you know your name or did your fall from grace hurt you more than expected?” Yoongi questioned softly in a reassuring manner, which was abnormal for the demon or any demon in general towards an angel of all things. He moved his hand downward to wipe the blood away from the unknown angel’s cheek then onto the dark jeans he wore before placing his hand back on the other’s head.

(Though it is possible to gain power through an angel by drinking their blood, they chose to kill said angel since angels would rather fight to the death than be used as a power source). When it comes down to an angel and a demon in a relationship, demons care a little bit but in the end, angels care more about it. To them the worse kind of relationship an angel could be in with a demon is a homosexual one since it went against their law. Even homosexual angels keep quiet about their own relationships since the fact they’re with the same sex, they are slowly but surely tainting themselves meaning they have to regularly cleanse themselves to keep their wings white.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The first time the old dark haired demon laid eyes on the little blond angel was more than fifty years ago. It was more along the lines of an accident in all honesty. He didn’t plan on coming in contact with an angel let along a newly created fledgling fresh out of God’s making. He was just roaming down the streets of the red light district in the human world looking for something to entertain him. It didn’t matter to him what entertained him. Sex with men or women, gambling, drinking, murder. It was all the same to him. If it did then he would have to find new ways of keeping himself busy when he didn’t have to devour a human soul or complete some pathetic  contract with trash.

That’s all humans were to him. Food or trash. Those he made contracts with were both. Exasperation and annoyance towards the one who summoned him to do some heinous crime for them yet possessing some twisted form of amusement. Exasperation and annoyance towards the reason why he was summoned and amusement knowing that their expression will be entertaining to see while he turns on them and kills them when he is done. That’s what he got done doing when he came across the little angel. He finished a job. Killed some retarded bastard human who ‘ordered’ him to kill the woman who cheated on him with another man. Silly human. He didn’t think it through when he chose to summon a demon of his caliber. No human did. Honestly. Fools. All of them really…but at least he had fun making the man scream in pain. Though his fun ran out when the human died and his soul was devoured. No matter. He always managed to find his entertainment.

And entertainment he found…albeit surrounded by human filth that was attempting to drag his newly found entertainment off somewhere. It was probably to a whore house. He didn’t know that the entertainment was a fledgling due to the it’s small, weak and pure presence. The old demon would have honestly ignored the fledgling until he caught it’s scent. It was an exotic combination. Vanilla…with a hint of lavender and purity he guessed. It wasn’t very strong, but his well trained and sensitive nose could pick up among the filth around them. His dark eyes went straight to where the fledgling was before moving over in that direction. It was a casual action. Casual enough for him to be ignored by the trash and for his hand to spear right through the male trash’s back. His pale hand gripped the human’s heart and ripped it out with little to no hesitation. The now deceased human’s partners attempted to leave, but with a spear composed of darkness through their chest was enough to leave the trash where they were.

The demon inhaled slowly and deeply through his nose while his eyes slid shut. The coppery smell of blood… It was such a beautiful scent. The additional scent of angel was even better. It made him wonder what the fledgling’s blood would smell like. His eyes opened to reveal piercing, icy blue orbs that focused intently on the terrified baby angel. He calmly removed his arm from the human’s chest allowing the body to hit the ground before taking a couple of steps towards the newborn angel until he was directly in front of the small thing.

The dark haired demon squatted down in front of the young angel and stared with his unnatural blue cat shaped eyes. He took in the other’s appearance with an impassive expression. The fledgling had fluffy and soft looking hair, which was a pale blond color. It probably was as soft as it looked if he knew better. He was small; childlike and delicate like if the demon decided to hit the child across the face using barely an eighth of his power, he could damage him beyond repair. The angel’s skin was smooth, pale and unmarred except for that crimson that splattered on the poor thing’s face. It was a rather beautiful sight in his opinion- seeing him covered in blood even if it was only slightly. What was an even more beautiful sight was the fledgling’s eyes. They were such a breathtaking shade of lavender, but filled with fear and horror. It’s how he usually liked seeing it especially in pain in the ass angels, but this fledgling rubbed him the wrong way.

The demon exhaled slowly before blinking once allowing his eyes to fade back to a dark brown almost black color. No need to terrify this newborn for now. ”Oi… Little angel. What are you doing so far away from home? Babies like you shouldn’t be down here. It’s not safe. You could get hurt…or worse killed.” To calm the angel down, he reached out with his clean hand and placed it on the soft and fluffy hair (Ah ha! He was right! It was soft!) before gently stroking his hair in a reassuring manner. God dammit… If any demon sees him act like this towards the fledgling then he’s killing them violently. ”I’m Yoongi. What’s your name, fledgling? Do you know your name or did your fall from grace hurt you more than expected?” Yoongi questioned softly in a reassuring manner, which was abnormal for the demon or any demon in general towards an angel of all things. He moved his hand downward to wipe the blood away from the unknown angel’s cheek then onto the dark jeans he wore before placing his hand back on the other’s head.
trail.content:
AU – Angel & Demon

Name - Min Yoongi / SUGA

Open/Closed – Closed

Closed To – @taetaeloli

Location – Seoul, South Korea

Time – 10:45 p.m.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

x Info Time x

Angels came first in the world then humans, which God created, and it wasn’t long before demons were born from tainted and sinful angels and corrupted human souls. Every few years an angel is born in heaven and they’re taught for at least twenty years on things they are suppose to know: history, rules, skills, powers, etc. Every angel has a human counterpart that they are suppose to watch over and protect also known as a guardian angel. The angel’s job is to watch over their human. They are not allowed to reveal themselves to their human and especially not to fall in love with them. Falling in love with a human was forbidden due to the different species and how a human could corrupt and cause an angel do things that they were against heaven’s rules.

An angel that has been tainted, their pure white feathered wings would start turning black. Depending on how long the angel has been tainted, they may or may not be able to be purified. If there are more black feathers than white then all the angel can do is slow down his or her corruption. If there is more white then it is possible to purify the angel. Fully tainted angels are kicked from heaven and down to hell where they begin the painful process of having their body’s reconstructed and changed to fit hell’s nature causing them to become a demon.

Demons can be recognized by their slightly pointed ears, fangs, and their eyes would occasionally flash red, gold or blue depending on age. Young demons are red, middle aged are gold, while elders had piercing blue eyes. It’s rare to find an elder due to the fact they prefer not leaving their homes in hell. Age doesn’t mean another demon is stronger meaning a young demon could be stronger than a middle age or elder demon and still have red eyes. Their eyes flash their ages’ color when the are experiencing strong emotions. Most demons tend to stay in their half demon form, which usually consists of leathery demonic wings, a long pointed tail, and slightly elongated nails. Demons can shift into a human form and walk on earth if they wish as a ‘human’ but they would be easily be discovered by an angel or very spiritual person due to their demonic aura. Their strong sense of smell and hearing occasionally is a weakness against strong scents and loud noises.

Angels are much harder to distinguish without their white wings and unnatural and pure look to them while in their angel form. Those their most distinguishable feature would be their eyes, which are usually warm, loving, and filled with life. Some male angels tend to have feminine features like legs, waist, face, etc. Despite that demons, on the other hand, can notice an angel by just their scent which either has a fruity or flowery scent mixed with something else that usually irritates most demons. One reason why demons dislike angels is usually an angel’s scent is overbearing depending on how strong the angel is. Another reason is that both species were polar opposites of each other, naturewise.

Despite their differences, very rarely an angel and demon would be friends or even more than that. Rarely because demons can get a power boost if they manage to kill and absorb the power of an angel through their blood. (Though it is possible to gain power through an angel by drinking their blood, they chose to kill said angel since angels would rather fight to the death than be used as a power source). When it comes down to an angel and a demon in a relationship, demons care a little bit but in the end, angels care more about it. To them the worse kind of relationship an angel could be in with a demon is a homosexual one since it went against their law. Even homosexual angels keep quiet about their own relationships since the fact they’re with the same sex, they are slowly but surely tainting themselves meaning they have to regularly cleanse themselves to keep their wings white.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The first time the old dark haired demon laid eyes on the little blond angel was more than fifty years ago. It was more along the lines of an accident in all honesty. He didn’t plan on coming in contact with an angel let along a newly created fledgling fresh out of God’s making. He was just roaming down the streets of the red light district in the human world looking for something to entertain him. It didn’t matter to him what entertained him. Sex with men or women, gambling, drinking, murder. It was all the same to him. If it did then he would have to find new ways of keeping himself busy when he didn’t have to devour a human soul or complete some pathetic  contract with trash.

That’s all humans were to him. Food or trash. Those he made contracts with were both. Exasperation and annoyance towards the one who summoned him to do some heinous crime for them yet possessing some twisted form of amusement. Exasperation and annoyance towards the reason why he was summoned and amusement knowing that their expression will be entertaining to see while he turns on them and kills them when he is done. That’s what he got done doing when he came across the little angel. He finished a job. Killed some retarded bastard human who ‘ordered’ him to kill the woman who cheated on him with another man. Silly human. He didn’t think it through when he chose to summon a demon of his caliber. No human did. Honestly. Fools. All of them really…but at least he had fun making the man scream in pain. Though his fun ran out when the human died and his soul was devoured. No matter. He always managed to find his entertainment.

And entertainment he found…albeit surrounded by human filth that was attempting to drag his newly found entertainment off somewhere. It was probably to a whore house. He didn’t know that the entertainment was a fledgling due to the it’s small, weak and pure presence. The old demon would have honestly ignored the fledgling until he caught it’s scent. It was an exotic combination. Vanilla…with a hint of lavender and purity he guessed. It wasn’t very strong, but his well trained and sensitive nose could pick up among the filth around them. His dark eyes went straight to where the fledgling was before moving over in that direction. It was a casual action. Casual enough for him to be ignored by the trash and for his hand to spear right through the male trash’s back. His pale hand gripped the human’s heart and ripped it out with little to no hesitation. The now deceased human’s partners attempted to leave, but with a spear composed of darkness through their chest was enough to leave the trash where they were.

The demon inhaled slowly and deeply through his nose while his eyes slid shut. The coppery smell of blood… It was such a beautiful scent. The additional scent of angel was even better. It made him wonder what the fledgling’s blood would smell like. His eyes opened to reveal piercing, icy blue orbs that focused intently on the terrified baby angel. He calmly removed his arm from the human’s chest allowing the body to hit the ground before taking a couple of steps towards the newborn angel until he was directly in front of the small thing.

summary: Эксперты проанализировали сложности Big Hit Entertainment и обсудили возможность ухода BTS
title: Эксперты проанализировали сложности Big Hit Entertainment и обсудили возможность ухода BTS
excerpt: Эксперты проанализировали будущее BTS. Хотя заголовок был сенсационным («Распадутся ли BTS?«), в сегменте появился журналист, который буквально все перерыл в поисках информации и прямо сказал, что вероятность того, что это произойдет, очень низкая. И дело совсем не в BTS, а скорее в Бан Ши Хёке и его теневом прошлом, связанным с долгами, о чем он не решается много […] Сообщение Эксперты проанализировали сложности Big Hit Entertainment и обсудили возможность ухода BTS появились сначала на SHOWASIA - ❶ Новости шоу-бизнеса ❖ K-POP, J-POP, C-POP.

summary:
Alohamora BTS + BLACKPINK Hogwarts AU
YoonKook/SugaKookie (ft NamJin + ChaeHope)
British wizards are still feeling the...
body:
Alohamora BTS + BLACKPINK Hogwarts AU

YoonKook/SugaKookie (ft NamJin + ChaeHope)

British wizards are still feeling the aftereffects of war, but they continue to move on having learned from their past. At least, most of them do. The Hogwarts halls are once again to fall victim to terrible conflict, and a group of young wizards and witches will find themselves at the centre of it. It won’t be easy, but at least they have eachother.

Part 24/??

Yoongi arrived at the hospital wing, exchanged a few words with madam Pomfrey, and headed over to Jungkook’s bed, taking a seat in the single chair beside him.

“Evening.” Jungkook greeted with a small smile. “You look shattered.”

“I am.” Yoongi mumbled. “How are you?”

“My head feels fuzzy and I can’t help but hear about half of the thoughts in this room.” Jungkook replied casually, and the older was stunned by his light-hearted attitude. “But Jisoo came to study with me earlier, which was nice.” He turned his head from staring upwards to look Yoongi in the eye.

“You went flying over the forbidden forest last night.” He said.

“Did someone tell you or did you take from my head.” Yoongi questioned with a tired smile.

“Jisoo told me; I’m trying real hard not to read your thoughts.” Jungkook replied. “Madam Pomfrey has no idea what’s going on with me. She’s never dealt with such a strong legilimens before. Jichu told me you guys were trying to figure it out though.”

“Yeah, we have a lot to try and do. We’ve made barely any real progress in figuring the snake enchantment and even though Joon’s been discharged he’s still not doing so great.” Yoongi told him.

The boys talked casually for a while, just trying to distract themselves from all of the terrible things going on around them. But after a while the air seemed to changed, and Yoongi felt his chest tighten as Jungkook curled in on himself in pain. His face went pale, his jaw clenched and hands in tight fists. Yoongi felt his heart break as a tear slid down the younger boy’s face, and he instinctively moved to wipe it away with his thumb. Jungkook’s hand shot up and grabbed Yoongi’s wrist in an almost vice-like grip, eyes opening slowly.

“It’s okay, Kookie.” Yoongi said softly, slowly running his thumb up and down Jungkook’s cheekbone. “You just have to wait it out.”

‘This hurts so much.“ Yoongi was thinking. 'I hate to see him like this. Why does it hurt this bad?’

After the longest ten minutes of Yoongi’s life, Jungkook’s episode ended and his entire body went limp, eyes falling closed as his head dropped to the pillow with a loud sigh.

"What… What does it feel like?” Yoongi questioned tentatively, fiddling with Jungkook’s clammy fingers.

“Like someone is just pushing pressure and noise into my head until my mental barriers shatter.” Jungkook mumbled weakly. He moved his hand so that his fingers were loosely interlocked with Yoongi’s. “And I’m going to be honest, I don’t think I’ll be able to not hear some of your thoughts.”

“That’s okay.” Yoongi whispered. “I should leave anyway; it’s almost curfew.”

“Promise to actually sleep tonight.” Jungkook said, and the older agreed to the request. “You can join the search efforts tomorrow. I know everyone is trying really hard for Lisa and I wish I could help.”

“Don’t worry about it, Kookie. We know you would search all day if you could.” Yoongi smiled. “I’ll see you tomorrow, okay?”

“Okay.” Jungkook yawned. “Go get some sleep.” He gave Yoongi’s hand a light squeeze before unlinking their fingers. “See you tomorrow.”

Yoongi stood up and headed to the door, turning back to look at his friend before leaving the hospital wing. Jungkook was curled up under the cover already half asleep, and Yoongi smiled to himself as he left.

“Okay.” Jungkook yawned. “Go get some sleep.” He gave Yoongi’s hand a light squeeze before unlinking their fingers. “See you tomorrow.”

Yoongi stood up and headed to the door, turning back to look at his friend before leaving the hospital wing. Jungkook was curled up under the cover already half asleep, and Yoongi smiled to himself as he left.

It won’t be easy, but at least they have eachother.

Part 24/??

Yoongi arrived at the hospital wing, exchanged a few words with madam Pomfrey, and headed over to Jungkook’s bed, taking a seat in the single chair beside him.

“Evening.” Jungkook greeted with a small smile. “You look shattered.”

“I am.” Yoongi mumbled. “How are you?”

“My head feels fuzzy and I can’t help but hear about half of the thoughts in this room.” Jungkook replied casually, and the older was stunned by his light-hearted attitude. “But Jisoo came to study with me earlier, which was nice.” He turned his head from staring upwards to look Yoongi in the eye.

“You went flying over the forbidden forest last night.” He said.

“Did someone tell you or did you take from my head.” Yoongi questioned with a tired smile.

“Jisoo told me; I’m trying real hard not to read your thoughts.” Jungkook replied. “Madam Pomfrey has no idea what’s going on with me. She’s never dealt with such a strong legilimens before. Jichu told me you guys were trying to figure it out though.”

“Yeah, we have a lot to try and do. We’ve made barely any real progress in figuring the snake enchantment and even though Joon’s been discharged he’s still not doing so great.” Yoongi told him.

The boys talked casually for a while, just trying to distract themselves from all of the terrible things going on around them. But after a while the air seemed to changed, and Yoongi felt his chest tighten as Jungkook curled in on himself in pain. His face went pale, his jaw clenched and hands in tight fists. Yoongi felt his heart break as a tear slid down the younger boy’s face, and he instinctively moved to wipe it away with his thumb. Jungkook’s hand shot up and grabbed Yoongi’s wrist in an almost vice-like grip, eyes opening slowly.

“It’s okay, Kookie.” Yoongi said softly, slowly running his thumb up and down Jungkook’s cheekbone. “You just have to wait it out.”

‘This hurts so much.“ Yoongi was thinking. 'I hate to see him like this. Why does it hurt this bad?’

After the longest ten minutes of Yoongi’s life, Jungkook’s episode ended and his entire body went limp, eyes falling closed as his head dropped to the pillow with a loud sigh.

"What… What does it feel like?” Yoongi questioned tentatively, fiddling with Jungkook’s clammy fingers.

“Like someone is just pushing pressure and noise into my head until my mental barriers shatter.” Jungkook mumbled weakly. He moved his hand so that his fingers were loosely interlocked with Yoongi’s. “And I’m going to be honest, I don’t think I’ll be able to not hear some of your thoughts.”

“That’s okay.” Yoongi whispered. “I should leave anyway; it’s almost curfew.”

“Promise to actually sleep tonight.” Jungkook said, and the older agreed to the request. “You can join the search efforts tomorrow. I know everyone is trying really hard for Lisa and I wish I could help.”

“Don’t worry about it, Kookie. We know you would search all day if you could.” Yoongi smiled. “I’ll see you tomorrow, okay?”

“Okay.” Jungkook yawned. “Go get some sleep.” He gave Yoongi’s hand a light squeeze before unlinking their fingers. “See you tomorrow.”

Yoongi stood up and headed to the door, turning back to look at his friend before leaving the hospital wing. Jungkook was curled up under the cover already half asleep, and Yoongi smiled to himself as he left.

body:
Typing to Type

Shits been rough my people. Sometimes I wish I could hit a restart button for my life. I’m still in love with seven men that I will never be able to meet, or afford to meet. Boy howdy I’m tired.
